1001100011100011 1001000100011101 0 -> sum: 0010101000000000, cout: 1
1100111010000000 1000101101101111 1 -> sum: 0101100111110000, cout: 1
0100000001001100 0000000000001010 0 -> sum: 0100000001010110, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
